markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Herbalism](/Feats.aspx?ID=1986) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 176 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Herbalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=62)

**Prerequisites**
[Herbalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1982); Expert in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

Your advanced alchemy level for herbalism increases to your level – 3. You gain the formulas for [elixirs of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) as soon as your advanced alchemy level is high enough to create them: lesser at 8th level, moderate at 12th level, greater at 16th level, and major at 18th level.
name: Expert Herbalism
